response.overview: A biopic of Napoleon Bonaparte, tracing the Corsican's career from his schooldays (where a snowball fight is staged like a military campaign) to his flight from Corsica, through the French Revolution (where a real storm is intercut with a political storm) and the Terror, culminating in his triumphant invasion of Italy in 1797.
response.title: Napoleon

release_dates.note: under 3 hours - Version with Final Tryptych
4h10 - « Opéra » version (short version) with Final Tryptych
9h22 - « Apollo » version (long version) without Final Triptych
7h restoration (La Cinémathèque française), Cannes Film Festival
7h restoration, La Seine Musicale (cinema screening with live music)
Blu-Ray & DVD (BFI) based on the 5h30 restoration (3rd by Kevin Brownlow)
Restoration (by Henri Langlois and Marie Epstein), Venice Film Festival
4h50 restoration (1st by Kevin Brownlow), Telluride Film Festival
